attributes.action: We demand a referendum on Abortion Law in Northern Ireland
attributes.background: On the 22nd of October one of the most liberal laws on abortion in Europe was undemocratically forced upon the people of Northern Ireland. The undersigned demand a referendum on this matter so that we get the chance for our voice to be heard.
